entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 1:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -12.9°C
Wind: NNE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2.
